13.04.name: wordpress/galette-user-sync
13.04.description: This plugin allow you to synchronize WordPress users into Gallette. If the user does not exist in Galette, it will be created using WordPress user informations. If the user already exist in Galette, the informations (not empty) of the WordPress user will replace fields in Galette. You can easily configure which field or meta from WordPress user is mapped on which field in Galette. You must specify before the synchronization which users you want to synchronise. This plugin permit the SSO between WordPress and Galette
